required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on February 08, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Physical Activity and Physical Fitness Parameters in COVID-19 Quarantine
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Physical Activity and Physical Fitness Parameters of Young Adults Before and After COVID-19 Quarantine

brief_summary.textblock: In this study; it was aimed to compare the physical activity levels of students who continued their university education face-to-face before the COVID-19 quarantine, and the values of physical activity levels related to health, physical activity levels and health-related physical fitness parameters in the post-quarantine period.

detailed_description.textblock: Within the scope of the course, the demographic information of the students will be recorded and physical activity status, physical fitness parameters, muscle endurance, cardiovascular endurance, flexibility and body composition will be evaluated.

primary_outcome.description: International Physical Activity Questionnaire Short Form

intervention.description: Within the scope of the course, the demographic information of the students (such as height, weight, body mass index) is recorded and the physical activity status is recorded with "International Physical Activity Questionnaire Short Form (UFAA)" and "Physical Activity Index (FIT Score)". With Sit Up test, cardiovascular endurance with "6 Minute Walking Test", "Pulse Rate Test (NHT)" and "Respiratory Rate Test (SHT)", flexibility with "Sit-Reach Test (OUT)" and body composition with "Waist , Hip and Neck Circumference with a Tape Measure "and" Body Fat Ratio "with formulas. After a full year of quarantine, the same students who were previously evaluated and accepted to participate in the current study will be evaluated with online remote video viewing methods (Teams, Zoom, etc.), with the same tests and measurements under supervision by the researchers involved in the study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Before the quarantine period, those who completed the physical activity level and physical fitness tests within the scope of Physical Activity I course
- Students who do not have any physical or mental problems for the tests and measurements to be applied
Exclusion Criteria:
- No internet access,
- Students who have an obstacle to taking tests and measurements
